page.title: 02LANDSCAPE
page.content: The area shows undulating lowlands, on which housing and industry have developed.The aesthetic qualities include tree-lined roads and a variety of open spaces, used for sport and leisure. { Edgbaston}offers an area of mainly large houses, both modern and old. The population density is low, and the region has many open spaces, including a golf course. {Balsall Heath}&{Selly Oak}represent areas of former Victorian wealth, now in decline. The population densities have increased. Many houses are in disrepair but renovation has taken place. {Moseley}is an area of affluence, with many large houses. There are several parks and open spaces, such as {Cannon Hill Park.
